features.item: 1208 SF Ranch on Corner Level Lot.

house_listing.comments: Next to forest, Homan and Macleay Parks. Custom one owner, one level. '50's charm. Remodeled Kitchen. Built-ins. Hardwoods (Some Under Carpets). Large, open level fenced lot. Automatic Sprinklers. Superb lawn and flower beds!

for_more_information_contact.firm_name: Windermere Cronin & Caplan Realty Group, Inc.
for_more_information_contact.firm_location: 311 B Avenue Suite 200 Lake Oswego, OR
